doctor.name: Dr. M.A Mannan
doctor.specialty: ENT (Ear, Nose, Throat) Specialist & Head Neck Surgeon
doctor.info: Dr. M.A Mannan is a ENT Specialist in Kushtia. His qualification is MBBS, DLO (DU). He is a Ex. Consultant, ENT at 250 Bedded General Hospital, Kushtia. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Sono Diagnostic Center, Kushtia. Practicing hour of Dr. M.A Mannan at Sono Diagnostic Center, Kushtia is 10am to 2pm (Everyday), 5pm to 7pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: Sono Tower, College Mor, Court Para, Kushtia

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Emamul Haque
doctor.specialty: ENT (Ear, Nose, Throat) Specialist & Head-Neck Surgeon
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Emamul Haque is a ENT Specialist in Kushtia. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), FCPS (ENT). He is a Assistant Professor, ENT & Head Neck Surgery at Kushtia Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Centre, Kushtia. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Emamul Haque at Popular Diagnostic Centre, Kushtia is 3pm to 7pm (Closed: Friday).
